title: Android-Based Performance Task Design for Statistics and Probability Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic statistical concepts (mean, standard deviation, etc.), foundational skills in hypothesis formulation and data analysis
context.additional_context: Targets pre-service teachers, aiming to strengthen their ability to apply statistical and probabilistic concepts in real-world contexts, with project-based learning facilitated via Android apps.

learning_goals: Learners can explain statistical analysis methods (hypothesis testing, correlation analysis, regression analysis, etc.) applicable in real educational settings.
Learners can complete project assignments solving statistical problems using Android-based apps.
Learners can reconstruct and present data interpretation results according to educational contexts through team-based collaborative activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
